changelog:
live stories fixes:
- No Stream screen with "Continue Streaming" button (unless rtmp)
- "N watching" top panel for currently streaming live story
- "X started live stream!" notifications
- disabled camera in attach, chat, stories; while call or live story is running (caused to stop the stream)
- fixed audio not coming from speaker, fixed media volume instead of phone volume in calls
- fixed resolution downgrade in live story streaming from a phone
- fixed rotating camera while streaming in live story from a phone
- fixed End Live Stream button
- selecting channels/user in starting live stream screen
- better rights checks in channel live story for streaming, deleting messages, changing live settings, sending stars and highlight, send as, ending live stream
- RTMP settings for channel stories fix
- minor glitch fix when opening live story from chatlist
- supported t.me/username/s/live links
- stars needed layer for insufficient balance in highlight and star reactions in live stories
- a bit better animation starting a live stream
- comments disabled screen in live stories (unless you are the admin, then it is disabled send as)
- hiding reactions that are lower than required minimum for sending messages in live stories
- star transaction for live story comments
- other minor fixes...

scheduled:
- recommend postponing scheduled repeated message when deleting
- fix changing repeating period when rescheduling
- do not apply thanos effect to sent scheduled (repeated) messages

- fixed setting reply color
